en:
Join the hundreds of researchers from around
           the world who are part of the Open Specy community by
           analyzing, sharing, processing, and identifying
           their Raman and IR spectra. These services are free and open source thanks to our partners:
sn:
Joinha mazana evaongorori vanobva kumativi ese
           nyika vari chikamu cheOpen Specy nharaunda na
           kuongorora, kugovera, kugadzirisa, uye kuziva
           yavo Raman uye IR spectra. Aya masevhisi ndeemahara uye akavhurika sosi tinotenda kune vatinoshanda navo:

en:
In Brief: To use the tool upload a csv, asp, jdx, spc, or spa file to the upload file tab.
                                  If csv, one column should be named 'wavenumber' (in units of 1/cm) and another named 'intensity'.
                                  You can smooth your data using an SG filter, baseline correct your data using the polynomial order of iModPolyFit, and restrict the wavelength range for the match.
                                  The result will be compared to an internal Raman or FTIR spectra library. The strongest 1000 matches along with your
                                  uploaded or processed data will be presented in an interactive plot and table. For more details click the button below
                                  or watch the detailed instructional video.
sn:
Muchidimbu: Kushandisa chishandiso kurodha csv, asp, jdx, spc, kana spa faira kune yekurodha faira tab.
                                  Kana csv, imwe koramu inofanira kunzi 'wavenumber' (muzvikamu zve 1/cm) uye imwe inodaidzwa kuti 'kusimba'.
                                  Iwe unogona kutsvedza data rako uchishandisa SG sefa, yekutanga gadzirisa data rako uchishandisa iyo polynomial odha yeModPolyFit, uye kudzora iyo wavelength renji yemutambo.
                                  Mhedzisiro yacho inofananidzwa neyemukati Raman kana FTIR spectra raibhurari. Iwo akasimba 1000 machisi pamwe neako
                                  yakarodha kana yakagadziridzwa data ichaunzwa mune inodyidzana kuronga uye tafura. Kuti uwane rumwe ruzivo tinya bhatani riri pazasi
                                  kana kuti tarisa vhidhiyo yekuraira yakadzama.

en:
Reference spectra was sourced from open access resources
           online, peer reviewed publications, and corporate donations. In the future
           spectra that is uploaded to the tool will be incorporated to the reference
           library to make it even better.
sn:
Reference spectra yakatorwa kubva kune yakavhurika kuwana zviwanikwa
           online, mabhuku akaongororwa nevezera rake, uye zvipo zvemakambani. Mune ramangwana
           spectra iyo inokwidzwa kune chishandiso ichabatanidzwa kune referensi
           raibhurari kuti zviite nani.

en:
To share spectra upload a file to the upload file tab. If you selected Share a copy of your spectra will be sent to the Community
           Data Warehouse on Open Science Framework. To add additional metadata, 
           fill in the avaliable metadata fields and click -Share Data-. The 
           spectra file that you uploaded along with your responses will be copied 
           to the a -With Metadata- subfolder at the link below. All shared data holds 
           a Creative Commons Attribution License 4.0.
sn:
Kugovera spectra rodha faira kune yekurodha faira tebhu. Kana ukasarudza Govera kopi yespectra yako inotumirwa kuNharaunda
           Data Warehouse paOpen Science Framework. Kuwedzera imwe metadata,
           zadza minda yemetadata iripo uye tinya -Share Data-. The
           spectra faira rawakarodha pamwe nemhinduro dzako richakopwa
           kune -NeMetadata- subfolder pane iyi link pazasi. Yese yakagovaniswa data inobata
           iyo Creative Commons Attribution Rezinesi 4.0.

en:
All parameters in this tool are tested to validate that 
           the tool is functioning as best as possible and determine the best default 
           parameters to use. Our current validation proceedure includes correcting 
           duplicated entries in the reference libraries, checking for spectra in 
           metadata that isn't in the spectral library, and ensuring the the default 
           parameters provide over 80% accuracy in the first match.
sn:
Ese ma parameter muchishandiso ichi anoedzwa kuti asimbise izvozvo
           chishandiso chiri kushanda zvakanyanya sezvinobvira uye sarudza yakanakisa default
           parameters yekushandisa. Yedu yazvino yekusimbisa maitiro inosanganisira kugadzirisa
           zvinyorwa zvakadhindwa mumaraibhurari ereferensi, kutarisa spectra mukati
           metadata isiri muraibhurari yekuona, uye kuve nechokwadi cheiyo default
           paramita inopa pamusoro pe80% kunyatsoita mumutambo wekutanga.

en: Updates, Feature Requests, and Bug Reports
sn: Updates, Feature Applications, uye Bug Reports

en: We keep track of all updates using version control on our code. Features can be requested and bug reported on GitHub.
sn: Isu tinochengeta zvese zvinogadziridzwa tichishandisa vhezheni kutonga pane yedu kodhi. Zvimiro zvinogona kukumbirwa uye bug inoshumwa paGitHub.

en: Follow us on Twitter @OpenSpecy. E-mail wincowger@gmail.com to be added to the mailing list.
sn: Titevere pa Twitter @OpenSpecy. E-mail wincowger@gmail.com kuti iwedzerwe kune iyo tsamba yetsamba.

en: Free FTIR Software: siMPle microplastic IR spectral identification software
sn: Yemahara FTIR Software: siMPle microplastic IR spectral identification software

en: Free Spectroscopy Learning Academy from ThermoFisher
sn: Yemahara Spectroscopy Kudzidza Academy kubva kuThermoFisher

en: Free Optical Microscopy Learning Resource from Florida State University
sn: Yemahara Optical Microscopy Kudzidza Resource kubva kuFlorida State University

en: Free desktop application for spectral analysis and links to reference databases.
sn: Yemahara desktop application yekutarisa spectral uye zvinongedzo kune referensi dhatabhesi.

en:
If you like, we share your uploaded spectra and settings with the spectroscopy community.
           By default, all data will be licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International (CC BY-NC 4.0).
           Uploaded spectra will appear here: https://osf.io/rjg3c
sn:
Kana uchida, tinogovera yako yakarodha spectra uye marongero nenharaunda yespectroscopy.
           Nekumisikidza, data rese richapihwa rezinesi pasi peCreative Commons Attribution-NonCommerce 4.0 International (CC BY-NC 4.0).
           Yakakwidzwa spectra ichaonekwa pano: https://osf.io/rjg3c

en:
Upload Raman or FTIR spectrum files as a csv, jdx, spc, or spa. A csv file is preferred. If a csv, the file must contain one column labeled 'wavenumber' in units of (1/cm) and another column labeled 'intensity' in absorbance units.
            If jdx, spc, spa, or 0 the file should be a single absorbance spectrum with wavenumber in (1/cm). These files will not always work perfectly because they are tricky to read so double check them in another software.
            Hit the 'Test Data' button to download a sample Raman spectrum.
sn:
Isa Raman kana FTIR spectrum mafaera se csv, jdx, spc, kana spa. A csv faira inosarudzwa. Kana iri csv, faira rinofanira kuva nekoramu imwe yakanzi 'wavenumber' mumayuniti e(1/cm) neimwewo column yakanyorwa kuti 'intensity' mumayunitsi ekunwa.
            Kana jdx, spc, spa, kana 0 faira rinofanira kuva rimwechete rinotora spectrum rine wavenumber mu (1/cm). Aya mafaera haagare achishanda zvakakwana nekuti ane hunyengeri kuverenga saka kaviri tarisa iwo mune imwe software.
            Dzvanya bhatani re'Test Data' kuti utore sampuli yeRaman spectrum.

en:
If the uploaded spectrum is not in absorbance units, 
           use this input to specify the units to convert from.Open Specy can 
           adjust reflectance or transmittance spectra to Absorbance units using 
           this drop down in the upload file tab. All of the preceding tabs 
           assume that the data is in absorbance units so you should make the 
           correction before continuing if needed. The transmittance adjustment 
           uses the log10(1/T) calculation which does not correct for system 
           and particle characteristics. The reflectance adjustment uses the 
           Kubelka-Munk equation (1-R)2/(2*R). We assume that the reflectance 
           is formatted as a percent from 1-100 and first correct the intensity by dividing by 100
           so that it fits the form expected by the equation.
           If none is selected, Open Specy assumes that the uploaded data is 
           an absorbance spectrum.
sn:
Kana iyo yakakwira spectrum isiri mumayuniti ekunwa,
           shandisa inopinza kutaura mayunitsi ekushandura kubva.Vhura Specy can
           gadzirisa reflectance kana transmittance spectra kune Absorbance units uchishandisa
           uku kudonha pasi muiyo upload file tab. Ese ma tabo apfuura
           fungidzira kuti data iri mumayuniti ekunyudza saka iwe unofanirwa kugadzira iyo
           kururamisa usati waenderera mberi kana zvichidiwa. Iyo transmittance kugadzirisa
           inoshandisa iyo log10 (1/T) kuverenga iyo isingagadzirise system
           uye particle maitiro. Iyo reflectance kugadzirisa inoshandisa iyo
           Kubelka-Munk equation (1-R)2/(2*R). Isu tinofungidzira kuti kuratidzwa
           inoumbwa sechikamu kubva pa1-100 uye chotanga kugadzirisa kusimba nekukamura nezana.
           kuitira kuti ikwane fomu inotarisirwa neiyo equation.
           Kana pasina yakasarudzwa, Vhura Specy inofunga kuti data rakaiswa ndeye
           kunyura spectrum.

en: This is a sample spectrum that can be uploaded to the tool for testing it out and understanding how the csv files should be formatted.
sn: Uyu ndiwo mucherechedzo wemucherechedzo unogona kukwikwidzwa kune chishandiso chekuchiyedza kunze uye kunzwisisa kuti mafaera ecsv anofanira kuumbwa sei.

en:
We share any uploaded spectra and metadata with the spectroscopy community if you fill out the metadata here and select share.
           Uploaded spectra and metadata will appear here: https://osf.io/rjg3c
sn:
Isu tinogovera chero yakarodha spectra uye metadata nenharaunda yespectroscopy kana iwe ukazadza metadata pano uye sarudza share.
           Yakakwidzwa spectra uye metadata ichaonekwa pano: https://osf.io/rjg3c

en: Upload some data to get started...
Smooth, Baseline Correct, and Download Processed Spectra
sn: Smooth, Baseline Correct, uye Dhawunirodha Yakagadzirwa Spectra

en: Some users may wish to save a copy of their processed spectrum. This button downloads the processed spectrum as a csv file.
sn: Vamwe vashandisi vangashuvira kuchengetedza kopi yavo yakagadziriswa spectrum. Iri bhatani rinodhawunirodha iyo yakagadziriswa spectrum se csv faira.

en: This smoother can enhance the signal to noise ratio of the data and uses a Savitzky-Golay filter with 12 running data points and the polynomial specified.
sn: Iyi yakapfava inogona kuwedzera chiratidzo kune ruzha reshiyo yedata uye inoshandisa Savitzky-Golay sefa ine gumi nemaviri inomhanyisa data mapoinzi uye iyo polynomial yakatsanangurwa.

en: This baseline correction routine has two options for baseline correction, 1) the polynomial imodpolyfit procedure to itteratively find the baseline of the spectrum using a polynomial fit to the entire region of the spectra. 2) manual lines can be drawn using the line tool on the plot and the correct button will use the lines to subtract the baseline.
sn: Iyi yekutanga kugadzirisa maitiro ine nzira mbiri dzekugadzirisa kwekutanga, 1) iyo polynomial imodpolyfit maitiro ekutsvaga nekutsvaga hwaro hweiyo spectrum uchishandisa polynomial fit kunharaunda yese yechitarisiko. 2) mitsara yemanyorero inogona kudhirowa uchishandisa iyo mutsara chishandiso pachirongwa uye bhatani rakakodzera rinoshandisa mitsetse kubvisa yekutanga.

en: Restricting the spectral range can remove regions of spectrum where no peaks exist and improve matching
sn: Kudzikamisa iyo spectral renji kunogona kubvisa matunhu ezviratidziro pasina mapikisi aripo uye kugadzirisa kuenzanirana

en: Identify Spectrum Using the Reference Library
This selection will determine whether the FTIR or Raman matching library is used. Choose the spectrum type that was uploaded.
sn: Sarudzo iyi inozoona kana raibhurari inofananidzwa neFTIR kana Raman inoshandiswa. Sarudza rudzi rwe spectrum rwakaiswa.

en: This selection will determine whether the uploaded (not processed) spectrum or the spectrum processed using the processing tab is used in the spectrum match.
sn: Iyi sarudzo ichaona kuti iyo yakarodha (isina kugadziridzwa) spectrum kana kuti spectrum yakagadziriswa uchishandisa tebhu yekugadzirisa inoshandiswa mumutambo we spectrum.

en: This selection will determine whether the library you are matching to consists of the full spectrum or only spectrum peaks.
sn: Sarudzo iyi ndiyo inosarudza kana raibhurari yauri kuenzanisa nayo ine yakazara spectrum kana chete spectrum peaks.

en: Help us reach our goal of revolutionizing spectroscopy.
sn: Tibatsire kuzadzisa chinangwa chedu chekushandura spectroscopy.

en: A paid team that is pushing Open Specy closer to the ultimate goal of 100% accurate spectral identification and deep spectral diagnostics with a single click
sn: Chikwata chakabhadharwa chiri kusundidzira Open Specy padhuze nechokupedzisira chinangwa che100% chakarurama chekuona chiziviso uye yakadzika spectral diagnostics nekudzvanya kamwe chete.

en: A single paid staff person working to update and build the community and the tool
sn: Mushandi mumwe chete anobhadharwa anoshanda kugadzirisa nekuvaka nharaunda uye chishandiso

en: Maintenance costs and minor ad-hoc updates and bug fixes
sn: Mari yekuchengetedza uye zvidiki ad-hoc zvigadziriso uye kugadzirisa kwebug

en: Keeping the app online and essential maintenance
sn: Kuchengeta iyo app online uye yakakosha kugadzirisa

en: Thank you for sharing your data!
Your data will soon be available at https://osf.io/stmv4/
sn: Yako data ichakurumidza kuwanikwa pa https://osf.io/stmv4/

en:
Uploaded data type is not currently supported; please
                      check tooltips and 'About' tab for details.
sn:
Mhando yedata yakakwidzwa haisati yatsigirwa parizvino; Ndapota
                      tarisa maturusi uye 'About' tebhu yeruzivo.

en:
If you uploaded a text/csv file, make sure that the 
           columns are numeric and named 'wavenumber' and 
           'intensity'.
sn:
Kana iwe wakarodha mameseji/csv faira, ita shuwa kuti iyo
           makoramu anenhamba uye anonzi 'wavenumber' uye
           'kusimba'.
